summary: Turns the collection of Dragon Priest Masks into a quest, including quest markers showing where to find them.
descriptionHtml:
This was an oft-requested mod by users of Stones of Barenziah Quest Markers. Killing a dragon priest (or installing the mod after one of them has already been killed) will begin a quest to find all eight dragon priest masks. Once they are all found, the quest will lead you to Bromjunaar Sanctuary and the final prize. The eight dragon priests will have quest markers (although no marker will show for Nahkriin until you meet him late in the main questline).

This mod doesn't actually touch the masks themselves - the markers point only to the priests, and if you lose the masks, they are gone.
However, this mod should be fully compatible with ones that change the stats of the masks. It has been confirmed to be compatible with Bromjunaar Extended. (In fact, I have modified no scripts, only added new ones, so I expect it to be compatible with virtually anything).


This mod is also available on the Steam Workshop:
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=90198062]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=90198062[/url]

A German translation thanks to johnwayne1930 is currently available in the downloads.
A Russian translation thanks to nerub221 is available here:
[url=http://www.modmaximus.net/load/10-1-0-1419]http://www.modmaximus.net/load/10-1-0-1419[/url]
A Polish translation thanks to MrQubo is available here:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45183/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45183/[/url]


If you are interested in a more lightweight approach to making the masks easier to find, check out whickus's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14042]Dragon Priest Mask Journal[/url]


Also check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9385]Stones of Barenziah Quest Markers[/url]
